Android: Available on any device that supports the hardware. Android Pay for NFC payments available in Play Store.[191]
iOS: 8+: iPhone 6/6 Plus and later (iPhone 5 and later if used with Apple Watch), via Apple Pay
4.3+: Personal Hotspot (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, USB; carrier dependent)

Feature: Direct file transfer over Wi-Fi Direct

iOS: AirDrop: 7+: Between iOS only; 8+: Between Mac/iOS only. (Note: AirDrop utilizes Wi-Fi as well)
